history.text: hello what is the name of the movie?
The blind side.
sounds good what is it about?
It's a sports movie kind of like a biography about a football player.
a professional football player?

Yes, he
 was a NFL player.
what was his name?
His name was Michael Oher.
He was an offensive lineman.
when did it take place what year?
Well the movie came out in 2009. Hmm, I'm not sure when the movie actually took place.
It has a pretty good movie rating.
is it a true story or not?
Yes, it's a biography on a real nfl player.
He was in foster care in Memphis, Tennessee because his mom was a drug addict.
ok and he made it into the nfl with a life like that that awesome
Yea, it seems like he had a rough upbringing, but he met a friend named SJ and things kind of improved from there.
those are the kind of stories and movies i like to watch true storys peoples lives
was cj a girl or guy?
I know me too. SJ was a guy.
where they kids when they met or teenagers or adult?
So after Michael met SJ, he started hanging around SJ's mom too. SJ was a kid that hung around Michael.
SJ's mom, her name was Leigh Anne.
ok and it was good for michael to be around sj and his mom
sj mom kinda take over the mom role for michael?
Yes, Leigh Anne was playing a mother role towards Michael and Leigh Anne's friends didn't really like her hanging around Michael.
They thought he might be dangerous.
because of his upbringing and how his mom was?
judging him for his parents faults
Well yea plus Michael had a rough upbringing, following the wrong crowd.
So he ran away because he was questioning why Leigh Anne even wanted him in the family.
When he ran away, he went to find his mom.
so he wasnt a good kid he was doing bad things hanging out with wrong crowd til he met sj then he started doing the right thing and trying to be good?
did he find her?

At first yes, but then when he found out about Leigh Anne's friends not wanting him around, he ran away to find his mom and he did find her. There was a gang leader at his mom's place when he got there.
and?
how did he get into the nfl?
The gang leader was talking about going after SJ and his mom. It sounded pretty intense and Michael got into a fight with the gang leader and other members.
He ended up getting accepted into this college called Ole Miss and he chose that school because it was closer to his home.
It sounds emotional because once he got into school, he said goodbye to Leigh Anne and SJ.
ok so did his mom get clean and did they live happily ever after?
No, it appears he left his mom after getting into the fight with the gang leader. He told them he was done with that and went off to college. This was before he joined the nfl.
I'm glad he decided not to stick around with his mom because it seemed like a bad idea.
I think he joined the NFL after college.
ok good well i think we can finish the survey now thank you sounds like a good book/movie
This movie itself has an A+ rating so I think it might be really good to watch.

uid2response.feedback: it sounds like a great movie i love true stories about people that had it real hard and came up stronger then ever.
